phcet.name: Pillai HOC Common Entrance Test (PHCET)
phcet.overview: PHCET is a common entrance test conducted by the Pillai Group for admission to various professional courses including Engineering, Pharmacy, Management, and Computer Applications across the Pillai institutions.

eligibility.engineering: Passed HSC with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics with minimum 45% marks (40% for reserved categories).
eligibility.pharmacy: Passed HSC with Physics and Chemistry and Biology or Mathematics with minimum 45% marks.
eligibility.management: Passed HSC or equivalent examination from a recognized board.

phcet.application_process: Applications can be submitted online via the official PHCET website https://phcet.in during the registration window. The application fee is INR 1000/- payable via net banking or debit/credit card.
phcet.exam_pattern: The test comprises multiple choice questions covering subjects based on the course — Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology, English. Duration is 2 hours.
phcet.admission_procedure: Merit list prepared based on PHCET score or JEE score (for engineering) and followed by counseling. Candidates must register for counseling with valid documents.
phcet.reservation_policy: As per Maharashtra state government norms and Pillai Group's internal policy.

faq.question: Can I apply for PHCET if I appeared for JEE?
faq.answer: Yes, you can apply for PHCET. Some courses accept JEE scores, while others require PHCET scores.

faq.question: Is there negative marking in PHCET?
faq.answer: No, there is no negative marking.

faq.question: Can I change my exam center after registration?
faq.answer: No, exam center changes are generally not allowed once registration is complete.

phcasc.name: Pillai HOC College of Arts, Science & Commerce (PHCASC)
phcasc.history: Established in 2008 under Mahatma Education Society, PHCASC is affiliated to the University of Mumbai and accredited with NAAC Grade A+ in 2022.
phcasc.location: Sprawling 35-acre green campus in Rasayani, Raigad District, Maharashtra.
phcasc.mission: To provide quality higher education with focus on holistic development, research, and industry readiness.
phcasc.vision: To become a premier institution nurturing young minds into competent professionals and socially responsible citizens.

faculty.profile: Highly qualified faculty with many holding PhDs and Masters. Experienced in academia and industry with focus on student mentorship and research.

infrastructure.computer_labs: State-of-the-art computer labs equipped with latest software, high-speed internet, and dedicated servers for practical learning.
infrastructure.library: Digital and physical library with over 15,000 books, national and international journals, e-books, and research databases.
infrastructure.auditoriums: Large auditorium with seating capacity of 500+, equipped with audio-visual facilities for seminars, conferences, and cultural programs.
infrastructure.sports_facilities: Cricket ground, football field, badminton courts, indoor sports room, and gymnasium.
infrastructure.hostel: Separate, secure hostels for boys and girls with mess facilities and recreational areas.
infrastructure.cafeteria: Multi-cuisine cafeteria providing hygienic and affordable meals.
infrastructure.other_facilities: Seminar halls, WiFi campus, parking, medical room, counseling center.

placements.overview: Dedicated placement cell organizing regular campus drives, internships, and workshops with over 50 corporate tie-ups.
placements.training: Soft skills training, resume building, group discussions, and mock interviews.

admissions.criteria: Merit based admission as per University of Mumbai and Maharashtra State norms.
admissions.procedure: Online application available at https://phcasc.ac.in/admissions. Submission of academic documents and entrance exam scores if applicable.
admissions.fees: Annual fees range between INR 12,700 to INR 22,100 depending on the course.
admissions.scholarships: Merit and need-based scholarships available for eligible students.

contact.address: Pillai HOC College, Rasayani, Raigad, Maharashtra 410207

faq.question: What are the timings of the college?
faq.answer: College operates from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM Monday to Saturday.

faq.question: Is the campus WiFi enabled?
faq.answer: Yes, the entire campus has free high-speed WiFi connectivity for students and staff.

faq.question: Are there any hostel facilities?
faq.answer: Yes, separate hostels for boys and girls are available within the campus.

faq.question: What extracurricular activities are available?
faq.answer: Students can participate in various clubs, sports teams, cultural events, and NSS activities.

phcp.name: Pillai HOC Polytechnic (PHCP)
phcp.overview: PHCP offers diploma courses in various engineering fields, focusing on practical skills and industry collaboration.
phcp.affiliation: Affiliated to Maharashtra State Board of Technical Education (MSBTE).

admissions.process: Apply online at https://phcp.edu.in/admissions or offline at college office. Admissions based on merit and availability.
admissions.fees: Diploma fees approximately INR 40,000 per annum.

facilities.workshops: Fully equipped workshops for practical training in mechanical, electrical, and civil fields.
facilities.labs: Computer labs with modern systems and software.
facilities.library: Technical books and journals supporting polytechnic syllabus.
facilities.internships: Industry internship opportunities facilitated through college.

phcp.faculty: Experienced faculty with diploma and degree holders having strong industry exposure.

contact.address: Pillai HOC Polytechnic, Rasayani, Raigad, Maharashtra

phcer.name: Pillai HOC College of Education and Research (PHCER)
phcer.overview: PHCER offers B.Ed. and M.Ed. courses aimed at preparing quality educators with a focus on modern pedagogical skills.
phcer.affiliation: Affiliated to Mumbai University and recognized by National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE).

admissions.eligibility: Graduation degree for B.Ed., B.Ed. degree for M.Ed.
admissions.procedure: Apply online at https://phcer.ac.in/admissions. Selection based on merit and entrance test as per university norms.

phcer.faculty: Qualified educationists with research background, focusing on innovative teaching methodologies.

facilities.library: Rich collection of education-related books and research material.
facilities.seminar_halls: Facilities for workshops, conferences, and guest lectures.

contact.address: Pillai HOC College of Education and Research, Rasayani, Maharashtra

campus.overview: Pillai HOC Group campus at Rasayani is a 35-acre lush green campus combining academics, sports, and cultural infrastructure.
campus.libraries: Multiple digital and physical libraries accessible 24/7.
campus.sports: Facilities include cricket, football, basketball grounds, badminton courts, table tennis, and indoor gym.
campus.transport: Fleet of buses connect Rasayani to Panvel, Navi Mumbai, and nearby areas. Private transport and parking available.
campus.hostels: Well-maintained hostels with mess, recreational areas, and 24x7 security.
campus.cafeteria: Multi-cuisine hygienic food outlets on campus.
campus.medical: On-campus medical room with a visiting doctor and tie-ups with local hospitals.
campus.wifi: Campus-wide free WiFi and computer labs with internet access.

annual_fests: NSS Week and Social Service Activities
events.guest_lectures: Regular guest lectures and workshops conducted by industry experts and academicians.
events.student_activities: Clubs and committees organize debates, quizzes, drama, dance, and music competitions.

placements.support: Dedicated placement cell with resume workshops, interview training, and industrial visits.

contacts.address: Pillai HOC Group Campus, Rasayani, Raigad, Maharashtra 410207

faqs.question: Is the campus safe for girls?
faqs.answer: Yes, the campus has strict security with CCTV surveillance, security personnel, and separate girls' hostel.

faqs.question: Are scholarships available?
faqs.answer: Yes, merit and need-based scholarships are available for deserving students.

faqs.question: What is the medium of instruction?
faqs.answer: English is the primary medium of instruction.

faqs.question: Can students participate in sports?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, sports teams and coaching are available for multiple games.
